title: Nemesis
description: Taylor Leith is a star on his own right. His web series 'Glaring Reality' has earned him millions and fame. But a glaring reality for him is the constant smear campaign against him by TV host Thomas Dach. He makes up his mind to go on Dach's show to knock him down a peg or two. Thomas Dach has never been more frustrated with another human being in his life. Taylor Leith was arrogant, self-centered and unwilling to back down. The interview was a chance for Thomas to bring Taylor down to earth. Nothing goes according to plan. M/M Romance.
author: Alexandra B. Donna
